name: Postmark Trigger
semantic_context: Starts the workflow when Postmark events occur
natural_language_description: 这是 Postmark Trigger 节点。主要用于: Starts the workflow when Postmark events occur

events.name: events
events.description: Webhook events that will be enabled for that endpoint
events.natural_language_description: 参数名: Events | 作用: Webhook events that will be enabled for that endpoint | 默认值: [] | (必填项)
available_options: Open (值: open) - Trigger webhook on open
Spam Complaint (值: spamComplaint) - Trigger on spam complaint
Subscription Change (值: subscriptionChange) - Trigger on subscription change

firstOpen.name: firstOpen
firstOpen.description: Only fires on first open for event "Open"
firstOpen.natural_language_description: 参数名: First Open | 作用: Only fires on first open for event "Open" | 默认值: False

includeContent.name: includeContent
includeContent.description: Whether to include message content for events "Bounce" and "Spam Complaint"
includeContent.natural_language_description: 参数名: Include Content | 作用: Whether to include message content for events "Bounce" and "Spam Complaint" | 默认值: False
